name: One who is lacking in self II
description:
A research on the body and its identity

An analysis of the artist's point of view in relation to his own perception of the circumstantial isolation of the indivı́duos that make up his material framework. The investigation addresses topics such as: the body immersed in its perceptual territory and, what reverberations are caused by this Mise en abyme of the Self in relation to and in the world, as a visible-seeing-thinking entity. Thus, it deals with the philosophy of perception, time, memory, the subject's capacity for autopoiesis, the body, and especially the materiality of the unity of the 'I'.

Dimensions of work: 5905 x 5905 300-Dpi
